item.title: Letv reaches one million Facebook likes within two months
item.description: Source: Socialbakers. Letv, a company that has yet to formally debut in India, has already amassed a following of one million on Facebook in just 60 days. According to Socialbakers, Letv is currently the top and fastest-growing phone brand page in India. In contrast, it took Xiaomi India more than 400 days to achieve the same milestone*. Over the past month, Letv has consistently ranked high in Facebook popularity, rivaling established brands like HTC, Motorola, Lava, Vivo, and Xiaomi in India.

item.title: Club Carlson celebrates reaching one million members in the Asia Pacific region
item.description: Carlson Rezidor’s international hotel rewards program, Club Carlson, celebrated a milestone by awarding its one millionth member in the Asia Pacific region with one million Club Carlson Gold Points. The lucky recipient, Rong Weiji, is a Sales and Marketing Division Manager at Santen Pharmaceutical. He became the millionth member upon checking in at the Radisson Blu Shanghai New World on August 22, 2014. When asked about his hotel preferences, Mr. Weiji explained that he values brand recognition, quality, service, and location.

item.title: DEAL.com.sg is celebrating its upcoming birthday by giving away S$5 million to customers
item.description: The flash sale website, DEAL.com.sg, is thanking its loyal customers by offering them millions of dollars in discounts. This initiative, launched after the company’s start in May 2010, also aims to draw in new customers. Patrick Linden, the CEO of DEAL.com.sg’s parent company, iBuy Group, expressed his gratitude, stating that the company is giving back $5 million to thank customers for their support over the past three and a half years.
